reviewText: The most educational dvd I have ever seen on why Christianity and Islam CAN'T unite !
Excellent educational and eye opening. Highly recommended for those seeking truth.

This is a must see DVD. Do Muslims and Christians serve the same God?  common word? Common ground? Hear the answers! Will answer the questions you have been wondering about. Be informed! ! Great to give to your Pastor.

Refreshing to hear the truth about what's going on with Islam and Christianity and the fact that they do not worship the same God.  Shahram Hadian speaks the truth in love, sharing from experience, knowledge, wisdom and heart!!!  We have been blessed to see him speak on a couple of occasions - he truly is anointed and passionate about speaking the truth in love!!!
